summary:
- **Capital Raising Update**: Issued 4,444,444 shares to two directors as part of a placement announced on 13 November 2024, approved by shareholders at the AGM on 9 June 2025.  
- **Exploration Update**: Ongoing exploration at PNG projects (assays/sampling), with results to be disclosed when available. No material findings reported yet.  

(Note: No new capital raised disclosed – issuance relates to prior placement. Exploration commentary is routine; omitted per rules unless exceptional.)
